items.name: Lightning Coil
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 29 Lightning Damage to Attacks
50% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage
flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies or inflicts ailments
explicitMods: 79% increased Duration of Ailments inflicted with Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 69% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal 22% more Damage with Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that apply an effect to an area around a targeted location. Cannot support Vaal skills or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

Supported Skills have 16% less Area of Effect
Supported Area of Effect Skills also affect areas in front of and behind the targeted area

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow which will stick into an enemy or wall, and then explode, dealing area damage around it, either after a duration or when the maximum number of arrows stuck to that target is reached. If an enemy has multiple Explosive Arrows stuck in them, the first one to explode will consume the others, adding their damage to its explosion.
